item.description:
ROAR!!!!! Don't be scared...this is going to be one WILD night! Three gals, Amazing music, hot promo models, giveaways and special guest Shawn Sixx from WBCN. What more could you want? Tickets are now available through Ticketmaster www.ticketmaster.com, can be picked up at the Berklee Peformance Center Box Office on Mass Ave or purchased at Cafe 939 the night of the show. It's a jungle out there so get your tickets NOW!

What: A Night of Fierce Female Singer Songwriters
Where: Café 939
939 Boylston St. Boston, MA 02215
When: Thursday, August 20, 2009 @ 8pm
Details: $10 all ages

This show ain’t over until the cute girls sing. ROAR, a Night of Fierce Female Singer Songwriters will feature the powerful performances of Casey Desmond, Lisa Bello and Krysta Youngs. With style, punch and a whole lot of prima power they will command the stage at 8pm on Thursday, August 20th at Café 939. You don’t want to miss out so grab a latte and be there!

www.krystayoungs.com
www.myspace.com/krystayoungs

www.caseydesmond.com
www.myspace.com/caseydesmond

www.lisabello.com
www.myspace.com/lisabello
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside ent. If need to, please call 774 232 0000
item.name: Roar, a night of Live Music Performances by up and coming female performers
